message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.RO 

This paper is about grounded language learning, which involves training neural network-based systems to understand language in the context of visual scenes. This topic is most closely related to the arXiv CS sub-category of computational linguistics (cs.CL), which is the most likely category for this paper. Other likely categories include artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), and robotics (cs.RO), as these fields are all relevant to the development and application of grounded language learning agents.
